Name: Fthiotis
Description: A region in central Greece, known for its diverse landscapes, including mountains, plains, and coastal areas.

Name: Viotia
Description: A region known for its historical significance, including the ancient city of Thebes.

Name: Evrytania
Description: A mountainous region, famous for its natural beauty, rivers, and outdoor activities.

Name: Euboea
Description: An island region, the second largest in Greece, known for its beaches, forests, and traditional villages.

Name: Phocis
Description: A region rich in archaeological sites, including the ancient sanctuary of Delphi.
